title: If Jesus' Resurrection Were A Hoax
description:
In an alternate universe, Peter, James, John, and the rest of the disciples get together to pull off the greatest hoax of all time. But does the plan have a flaw?

Check out what iBIBLE is doing in one of the most exciting Bible projects of our generation: https://www.youtube.com/watch?app=desktop&v=Rad0ZGXpCyw
